title: Large-Scale Database-Driven Instructional Design Project Management Mastery Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and curriculum development experience
context.additional_context: A database utilization competency enhancement program based on real-world cases in a BYOD environment, targeting general citizens with prior experience in science education material development projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain procedures for integrating and managing educational project schedules, personnel, and budgets via a database
Learners can build a system to track the real-time progress of science curriculum material development projects
Learners can write analytical reports for optimizing educational resource allocation through data-driven decision-making
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
